db:abstract.db:para: Encapsulates the data of an HTML5 web notification.
This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.9.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type contains the information and API for HTML5 desktop and push notifications.
Web engine notifications are passed to the user in the WebEngineProfile::presentNotification() signal.
For more information about how to handle web notification, see the Notification Example.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] direction : enumeration
db:section.db:para: The text direction for the notification's title and body.

db:td.db:para: Items are laid out from left to right.
Items are laid out from right to left.
The direction to lay out items is determined automatically.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] language : string
db:section.db:para: The primary language for the notification's title and body.
Its value is a valid BCP 47 language tag, or the empty string.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] message : string
db:section.db:para: The body of the notification message.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] origin : url
db:section.db:para: The URL of the page sending the notification.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] tag : string
db:section.db:para: The tag of the notification message.
New notifications that have the same tag and origin URL as an existing one should replace or update the old notification with the same tag.

db:section.db:title: closed()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the web page calls close steps for the notification, and it no longer needs to be shown.

db:section.db:title: void click()
db:section.db:para: Creates and dispatches a JavaScript click event on notification.
Should be called by the notification platform when the notification is activated by the user.

db:section.db:title: void close()
db:section.db:para: Creates and dispatches a JavaScript close event on notification.
Should be called by the notification platform when the notification is closed, either by the underlying platform or by the user.

db:section.db:title: void show()
db:section.db:para: Creates and dispatches a JavaScript show event on notification.
Should be called by the notification platform when the notification has been shown to user.
